text.div:
ServiceDeliveryLocation key value set

This value set defines the set of codes used to identify the service delivery location.

This value set has an inline code system Intermountain Healthcare Health Data Dictionary, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
119 FacilityA location that is categorized by the nursing skill, specialty, or type of care delivered

In addition, this value set includes codes from other code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-EntityCode
    CodeDisplay
    WINGWing Location
    ROOMRoom Location
    BEDBed Location

name: ServiceDeliveryLocation key value set
description: This value set defines the set of codes used to identify the service delivery location.

concept.definition: A location that is categorized by the nursing skill, specialty, or type of care delivered
